## CredentialManager.validateRefreshCredentials() method

Validates the specified set of refresh authentication credentials.

**Signature:**

```typescript
validateRefreshCredentials(credentials: RefreshAuthInfo): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  credentials | [RefreshAuthInfo](./foundation-comms.refreshauthinfo.md) | The credentials to validate. |

**Returns:**

boolean

`true` if the credentials are valid, or `false` otherwise.
